row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY
:DEFINE &ARRAY#, string, 10 :FILL &ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_AD_DC#, ".") :SET &DC# = "" :SET &I# = 1 :WHILE &I# <= 10 : IF &ARRAY#[&I#] <> "" : IF &I# = 1 : SET &DC# = "dc=&ARRAY#[&I#]" : ELSE : SET &DC# = "&DC#,dc=&ARRAY#[&I#]" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &I# = ADD(&I#, 1) :ENDWHILE :P &DC#
:IF &UC4RB_AD_GROUP_OU# <> "" : SET &OU# = ",ou=&UC4RB_AD_GROUP_OU#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AD_CONTAINER# <> "" : SET &CONTAINER# = ",cn=&UC4RB_AD_CONTAINER#" :ENDIF
! -------------- Powershell Commands -------------------
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"
Import-Module ActiveDirectory
dsadd group "cn=&UC4RB_AD_GROUP#&OU#&CONTAINER#,&DC#" -scope &UC4RB_AD_GROUP_SCOPE# 2>&1
if ($? -eq $true) { write-host "Group '&UC4RB_AD_GROUP#' created in domain '&UC4RB_AD_DC#\&UC4RB_AD_GROUP_OU#'"
}
!-------------------------------------------------------
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
